content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest (position -17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter (position -16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace (position -15.0, -51.0)
- Output chest (position -12.5, -50.5) containing iron plates
- Burner inserter (position -13.5, -50.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest (position -27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter (position -26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace (position -25.0, -59.0)
- Output chest (position -22.5, -58.5)
- Burner inserter (position -23.5, -58.5)

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position 41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest (position 41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter (position 41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation System at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler (position -4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump (position -3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups for water and steam circulation

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine (position 8.5, 13.5)
- Input chest (position 5.5, 13.5)
- Output chest (position 11.5, 13.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material handling
- Connected belt groups for material transport
- Lab for research

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting non-existent items
- Always verify item existence in storage before attempting extraction
- Check storage chest inventory contents before attempting to extract specific items

### Errors in furnace operations
- Ensure furnace has both fuel and raw materials before attempting to extract products
- Wait for smelting process to complete before attempting to extract products

### Production line stoppages
- Monitor assembling machine status for ingredient shortages
- Ensure consistent supply of all required materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Keep fuel levels adequate in all burner-powered devices

### Resource management
- Maintain adequate copper plate production to prevent production bottlenecks
- Balance production of different materials to maintain continuous operation
